data.title: Photo gallery from the Lionsâ€™ 14-3 preseason loss to the Giants
data.meta_description: The Detroit Lions started off their 2024 campaign with a 14-3 preseason road loss to the New York Giants on Thursday, Aug. 8, 2024, playing very few starters after sharing two days of joint practices early in the week with the Giants.
data.text:
The Detroit Lions started off their 2024 campaign with a 14-3 preseason road loss to the New York Giants on Thursday, Aug. 8, 2024, playing very few starters after sharing two days of joint practices early in the week with the Giants. The Lions continue their preseason play at Kansas City on Saturday, Aug. 17, 2024.

Detroit Lions defensive end Aidan Hutchinson (97) watches play against the New York Giants from the sidelines during the third quarter of an NFL football game, Thursday, Aug. 8, 2024, in East Rutherford, N.J. (AP Photo/Seth Wenig)

The New York Giants and Detroit Lions face off at the line of scrimmage during the third quarter of an NFL football game, Thursday, Aug. 8, 2024, in East Rutherford, N.J. (AP Photo/Seth Wenig)

New York Giants linebacker Benton Whitley (48) reacts after a defensive play against the Detroit Lions during the third quarter of an NFL football game, Thursday, Aug. 8, 2024, in East Rutherford, N.J. (AP Photo/Pamela Smith)

The New York Giants and Detroit Lions face off at the line of scrimmage during the third quarter of an NFL football game, Thursday, Aug. 8, 2024, in East Rutherford, N.J. (AP Photo/Seth Wenig)

New York Giants cornerback Christian Holmes (35) tackles Detroit Lions wide receiver Jalon Calhoun (80) during the fourth quarter of an NFL football game, Thursday, Aug. 8, 2024, in East Rutherford, N.J. (AP Photo/Seth Wenig)

Detroit Lions cornerback Steven Gilmore (24) tackles New York Giants running back Dante Miller (25) during the third quarter of an NFL football game, Thursday, Aug. 8, 2024, in East Rutherford, N.J. (AP Photo/Pamela Smith)

Seven takeaways from Lionsâ€™ 14-3 preseason loss to Giants

Gray runs for 2 touchdowns as the Giants beat the Lions 14-3 in a preseason game with few starters

Originally Published: August 8, 2024 at 10:41 p.m.
